stripped_text: The first time you trash an accessed card each turn, you may place power counters on Mache equal to that card's trash cost. 3 hosted power counters: Draw 1 card.
text: The first time you trash an accessed card each turn, you may place power counters on Mâché equal to that card's trash cost. 3 hosted power counters: Draw 1 card.
title: Mâché
